DOC.brief_summary: This study test efficacy 8-week , Skype-based , group resiliency train intervention ( The Relaxation Response Resiliency Program ) improve psychological stress patient Neurofibromatosis . A control group receive general health education curriculum . The investigator hypothesize patient improve measure psychological stress result resiliency program . A substudy ( Unique Protocol ID : 2013P002605b ) approve test study sub-population : patient NF2 hard hearing .
DOC.brief_title: Resiliency Training Patients With Neurofibromatosis Via Videoconferencing With Skype
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old 2 . Can read speak English 6th grade level 3 . Diagnosis neurofibromatosis type 1 , neurofibromatosis type 2 , schwannomatosis 1 . Severe active untreated major mental illness would interfere study participation , determine discretion study investigator ( e.g . untreated psychosis suicidality ) 2 . Recent ( within past 3 month ) change antidepressant medication 3 . Use formal relaxation training ( include past participation mindbody program ) , currently past 6 month . 4 . Unable unwilling sign inform consent document 5 . Unable unwilling complete psychological assessment online via REDCap system . 6 . Unable unwilling participate intervention deliver via videoconferencing Skype .
